titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Centennial Anniversary Records, 1960-1961
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke April 2007

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Correspondence, clippings, minutes, programs, audio tapes, and other items relating to the organization of and events held during the 100th anniversary of Vassar College.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, clippings, minutes, programs, audio tapes, and other items relating to the organization of and events held during the 100th anniversary of Vassar College. Audio tapes.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: This collection contains audio tapes and a tape player is necessary.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Centennial Anniversary Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
